title: How to fix corrupted file on LoL?
body:
My computer shut down in the middle of a LoL update and I don't know how to fix it. I tried opening the client and it tells me it has reverted the game to a previous version, and then when I try to click the options button (to find the repair button) it's unselectable because I'm being forced to restart for a mandatory update. I'm no tech wizard so plz help me

There's also this popup at the bottom of my screen telling me there's a corrupt file: https://prnt.sc/f91zit

replies.body: Your computer shutting down is pretty serious and can be caused by hardware failure.  As a first step, check your vents and make sure they have good air flow and clear of dust.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our  tech team will dig deeper to see what's happening.  We'll respond back as soon as we can.
